title: Bush Refrigeration Walk-In Cooler
item_description:
Bush Refrigeration Walk-In Cooler

  • Year: 2007
  • Manufacturer: Bush Refrigeration
  • Width: 7’
  • Length: 14’ 6”
  • Height: 8’
  • Evaporator units located in walk-in cooler.
  • Removal Note: Buyer must arrive prepared to disassemble walk-in. This lot will be need to be completely disassembled in order to be removed from the building.
  • Buyer Removal Requirements: Condenser units are located on roof and will require professional crane service for removal. Buyer must use licensed professional for capturing and removing refrigerant as part of the the disassembly of the walk-in cooler. Buyer is responsible to remove all parts related to this system.
  • Deposit: The buyer will need to provide a $1,000 deposit, which will be refunded once the property manager confirms that no damage has been done to the building.
